website_summaries.verdict: A power strip that comes with an extra-long extension cord.
pros: Built with a 25-foot extension cord to help you get the outlets where you really need them
Holes in back allow the protector to be mounted if needed
Length of the cord solves a common problems with power strips
cons: This power cord is a basic style with few features

customer_reviews.title: SWITCH BROKE AFTER LITTLE USE
customer_reviews.text: The power switch has a faulty connection, the switch has to be Delicately balanced somewhere between half off and half on in order to hear a tinny zzz-z connection noise and the red light blink on. Don't count on it to stay on long though! But if you're looking for a ~15min solution for a power situation, this is your guy! I regret buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: ITEM WAS NOT NEW
customer_reviews.text: THE ITEM WAS NOT NEW! THE BOX WAS OBVIOUSLY OPENED AND THE CORD WAS STUFFED BACK INTO ORIGINAL BOX! IT DIDN'T EVEN FIT IN THE ORIGINAL BOX CORRECTLY! I NEED THE ITEM NOW, SO NO TIME TO RETURN!
customer_reviews.author: HonestGal

customer_reviews.title: High Quality. Perfect Outlet & Surge Protector
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a specific area of our great room that needed power. The 15 footer was the perfect length and the 6 outlets was the perfect number....to power my 2 recliners, lamp,laptop, and cell phone. The quality is excellent and I would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Fogelbergfan

customer_reviews.title: Great Power Strip if you are looking for a good length of cord.
customer_reviews.text: This surge protector and especially the length of the cord was perfect to set my wife up with her laptop and tablet at the location in the living room. The cord was plenty long where I even had to tie up a couple of feet or so and still have plenty of slack. Solid construction and and good price. I would definitely recommend this surge protector power strip.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Long electric cord
customer_reviews.text: This surge protector has six electric outlets (sockets) and an on/off switch that shines with a red light, so it's easy to find. The outlets work, and the cord is long enough to extend from my bathroom heater down a short hallway and across another hallway and a storage area to a wall socket.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Holser

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Does not stay powered on. Nothing plugged in here gets juice.
customer_reviews.author: V. Brown

customer_reviews.title: A great 15 foot surge protector, but has minor annoyances
customer_reviews.text: Wanted an affordable 15ft surge protector and this was worth a shot. It is still a great unit, but the stip is so slim that it barely stays flat on the desk/floor and always flips sideways. It also has a fat head on the AC end, but I knew that going in. It works perfectly fine and I highly recommend for someone who needs a 15 footer and doesn't want to pay top dollar for a fancy one this is your best option
customer_reviews.author: The Data MasterTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a power cord/surge protector strip with a long cord so I could plug in my Keurig machine. I live in an older home with very few outlets or counter space so this was a "must need" product for me. It is made a good quality material and is extremely durable. As for the vendor, I was expecting delivery within 7-10 days and I had it 3 days after placing my order. Now that is great service.
customer_reviews.author: suzybee30

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new surge protector because my last one had been retired after having a strong surge. I wanted something very long. This certainly fits the bill at 15'. This product appears sturdy and basic. I haven't had any power surges since I began using it; thus, I can't say how it will work. I have no reason to believe it won't work as advertised. It was sent promptly and was well packaged. Very good company with which to do business.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Dy

customer_reviews.title: Especially like the lighted on/off button!
customer_reviews.text: Top quality materials and construct. This is the 2nd one I've installed in my motorhome and it's especially good for me to see at a glance (from a distance/ in the dark, etc.) whether my inverter is on/off. If the inverter is powered, the light on this power strip will be lit up so very easy to determine status. No matter how you ultimately use them, you'll probably find it handy to determine on/off status at a glance.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Peartree

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: Plugs are ALL loose. Cheap will have to buy a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Wicked West

customer_reviews.title: Good, long cord
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for my parents living room that would take all the electric chair/heating pad/etc cords, and this worked perfectly. The extra long cord makes it very easy to get it plugged into an outlet, without having to use another "extension" cord, possibly causing a fire hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Problem solver
customer_reviews.text: Needed an extra long surge protector to solve problem with room furniture arrangement/location of cable/electrical outlets and this product solved it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Norgeblonde

customer_reviews.title: Solves many issues
customer_reviews.text: The number of outlets plus the length of the cord solved many of the issues I faced when going to quilt retreats with my machine, iron, light and phone charger. I can plug is extra items as needed and turn everything off at once. Perfect fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: BA in LA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have really inconvenient power outlets in my home. I needed a power strip with a LOOONG cord. I couldn't find anything locally that didn't have a short cord. So glad I found this, it's just what I needed and no more climbing behind furniture and having to move things out of the way just to plug something in. I think I want another one now! Or two or three!
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Added flexibility to you home
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased to find a surge protector with long lengths. I am pleased with my purchase. I was able to move my TV and cable box to a location in my new oddly shaped living room. I feel protected in case of a power outage! The cord is strong and well made. You are able to place the unit on a wall if you would like. I recommend this product and the company for emailing me and following up with me. That is "customer service!"
customer_reviews.author: KUAPUKAI

customer_reviews.title: 25' cord solves a lot of problems!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't connected this yet but have it in the basement to connect from the outlet above the hanging fluorescent light fixture to run across the overhead joists and down a wall to use over a counter......need/want to attach to concrete wall. Plan to stop using the 50' orange power cord that is constantly curled all over the basement floor!
customer_reviews.author: teacher2

customer_reviews.title: Good product reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Using it now, was so happy to receive it because one that I’m still using is kinda old 😁... now I have great support from a new one which is a nice product. Thanks for being out there for us with all these electronics. In the future however.. I would definitely suggest making the cord a bit longer still . Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Pf

customer_reviews.title: I will not re purchase.
customer_reviews.text: When I plug anything into it, it flops over on its side.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Haley

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of this surge protector in use, the red power button no longer stays in the "on" position. No matter how many times you try to reset it, it will not come back on unless you hold the button in just the right place. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MF893

customer_reviews.title: Very Hot Power Strip
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a long corded power strip for my living room TV. We plugged it in and within ten minutes the power strip itself became very hot to the touch as well as the plugged in cord.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surge Protect with long cord
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I bought it to use at school (where I work) to connect desktop computers to the surge protector. This is the only one that I found that was actually long enough and a surge protector that allowed me to arrange the desks in a more functional position.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Business & Personal Use
customer_reviews.text: I am not usually in the market for power strips - I don't have much use for them. However, my work came to me a few months ago and asked me to purchase a 50-ft. power strip. I work at a recreational facility that houses a Hurricane Simulator - a giant machine that packs a huge punch. I needed to find something inexpensive that could also handle the voltage the Simulator requires. Alas! This power strip has done more than I expected. It arrived to our business address only days after ordering it and has quickly become a (semi-) permanent fixture in our facility. I am very confident that this strip will continue to perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla G

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: We moved some furniture around and realized that there was only the one plug in on that side. Other surge protector weren't long enough or sturdy enough. This was both. Now our kindle's and phones get charged and the cord reaches all the way next to the chair. We feel comfortable plugging in several things at once without using extention cords. I have already recommended it to a few friends.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Need that extra few feet sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Could of used some hardware to attach to the wall. Odd sized screws were not included. The many misc. screws I had did not fit in the keyholes on the device. It is hanging, kind of although crocked. No screws the right size to remount with. Enough holes in the wall.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you need to run a long extension cord that is surge protected with allot of 🔌’s!
customer_reviews.text: My bedroom wall plug 🔌 ins are located in weird positions and the way I have my bed and night stands set up I’m not able to plug anything in. I didn’t want to get just any ordinary cord extension that was not surge protected so I purchased this and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Prestige PRIME Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Eight foot cord great for older homes
customer_reviews.text: The eight foot cord is very nice for older homes with 2 or 3 outlets in a good-sized room. The strip works great but it requires considerable hand/wrist/arm strength to plug a cord into it. It would be nice if one could opt out of the "child resistant" feature after age 75!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have the extension and power strip integrated
customer_reviews.text: We have a large home office room with work desks in the middle. This allows us to plug in lamps and computers without having a half a dozen cords running all over the floor or feeling like we're creating a fire hazard with a mix of extension cords and power strips, etc.
customer_reviews.author: B.A.2010

customer_reviews.title: A piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked for two days. Then died. Cheap Chinese made garbage.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We needed an extra long cord on this power strip to accommodate two pieces of medical equipment that stand apart from each other. We've been using the new strip for about a week and everything is fine. No issues. It's hard to find an extra long cord, we are glad to have this one.
customer_reviews.author: lilyinchicago

customer_reviews.title: Protects as advertised
customer_reviews.text: With all of the added technology in my home it was past time for me to increase the lightning protection. We had a storm last night with no lost equipment. I hope that means your Digital Energy surge protectors are working as well as the much higher priced ones.
customer_reviews.author: Luckey David

customer_reviews.title: figured it was good for 15amps since it says it has #14 wire
customer_reviews.text: figured it was good for 15amps since it says it has #14 wire, it tripped when i tried to use it for other than some audio equipment. the load should have been around 10 amps. (I have not had a chance to take any actual amperage readings to see exactly what amperage made it trip). should have ordered a longer cord as well, seems possibly a little short but maybe i just under estimated my need. i will try to update this when I have more info. seller just requested a review a couple of times
customer_reviews.author: A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Just be aware.
customer_reviews.text: it Does its job as a long power outlet but the receiving holes have the metal close together and it was hard to get the plugs in. If you were frequently plugging in and out you would get irritated. My plugs are computers and will stay connected. The “quality” seems to be fine. But the design or construction is lacking. I ordered two and they both suffered so it’s not a one-off issue.
customer_reviews.author: MrJodyJones

customer_reviews.title: Solid cord extension
customer_reviews.text: Digital Energy 6-Outlet Surge Protector Power Strip with 8-Ft Long is a solid cord extension. It comes with the color and and cord length as described. This is a very good investment regarding "value for money". I recommend it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yunio

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Even better price!
customer_reviews.text: We needed 25 feet of cord on a surge protector to meet the fire marshall's requirements for safety in our home. We live in a historic home, and only had one outlet per room. These not only met our needs, but also were a LOT less expensive than the ones we found in big box stores that were only 15 feet long! Great product, and even better price. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Creates convenient outlet options
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my basement. When our home was built there was only one outlet in our entire basement. This power strip has a 25 foot cord which allows me to create a 6 outlet source in the center of our basement. The convenience is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: DBLCRJ

customer_reviews.title: Power Strip
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Needed extra length cord to stretch to a corner shelf about 5' off the floor. Plugged 4 items in the strip and everything works as expected. In use for about 1 week with no problems. Would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Configit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product so far
customer_reviews.text: I really cannot leave durability review as I purchased just few weeks ago. So far I am pleased with this product. It seem to be good quality. We have not had recent power outages/electrical storms..that will be the true test! Stay tuned!
customer_reviews.author: Nelly Bly

customer_reviews.title: Product quality is great.
customer_reviews.text: Although, I just received this product, it has performed as stated. I like the extra cord length because I can position it in a location that is easier to access. I have multi items filling the connections and during an electrical storm, just one click takes care of shutting them all off, hopefully saving all my valued items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a surge protector power strip with a long-ish cord. I also wanted one that didn't look too industrial since I was going to use it in my bedroom. This one worked perfectly for me and I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Louff

customer_reviews.title: Versatile extension cord
customer_reviews.text: We are using this product to power our treadmill/TV/Chromecast area in the basement. There aren't a lot of outlets to choose from so the long cord is fantastic and it mounted to a wood beam easily. Been great so far. Fast shipping and great price. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: R. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to mount on wall
customer_reviews.text: I needed an 8 foot cord; that is the positive. However, the two mounting keyholes on the back are practically worthless because they are so tiny that finding screws with heads thin enough to fit the slots is practically impossible. I had to drill out the keyholes. There is no template included for keyholes so i has to make one
customer_reviews.author: Willy Lohman

customer_reviews.title: Power from Across the Room
customer_reviews.text: Welllllllll, this isn't exactly rocket science.... It's a surge-protected power strip with a long cord. If that is what you need, this will do the job. It was purchased for a college dorm room that has very stringent guidelines about extension cords, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence G. Byrne

customer_reviews.title: You plug stuff into it and it works. It’s also really long, 15ft to be exact.
customer_reviews.text: Yup, It’s a really long surge protector. It has powered up my stuff with no issues. I must say, No surges but I know it’s protecting!! It even has a nice little illuminated on/off switch. Better leave a review or else these people will send you emails every week asking you to leave a review.
customer_reviews.author: St.Jeezy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a great product so far. The 25' cord seems robust and fits perfectly to bring several outlets to where they are needed in my garage. The power strip itself seems to be fairly sturdy for an indoor strip and has plenty of outlets. Overall a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Surge Protector - Extention Cord
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a surge protector/power strip for a small air conditioner. I was surprised to find one with a 25 foot cord. The description indicated that it should work for anything except for a space heater. It has allowed me to use the air conditioner in a window that did not have an easy access to an electrical outlet. I am enjoying the cooler temperature in my house to offset the summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Carr

customer_reviews.title: A powerful strip...!
customer_reviews.text: Hey, it's a power strip, I got what I ordered. I got it quickly and it works just as it is supposed to. I wanted black and this vendor offered it in both black and white.
customer_reviews.author: PCM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product, heavy duty extension cord.
customer_reviews.text: There were just enough outlet connections (6) for my use. I am using it In my office for my radio and coffee mug warmer. Has an on/off switch which is good for me since I don't need the radio or mug warmer to be left on when I leave my office. Would buy again, would reccommend to friends. Delivered on time, product as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: John Lamb

customer_reviews.title: This seems to be a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleased with this Digital Energy 6 outlet surge protector. I ordered it in white. The cord length is perfect. The cord and surge protector seem sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: 6-Outlet Surge Protector Power Strip with 25-Ft Long Extension Cord
customer_reviews.text: The 25 ft. extension cord is just perfect for the room I used it in. Six outlets is good as it lends itself to some flexibility with usage.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Foltz

customer_reviews.title: Surge Multiple Outlet
customer_reviews.text: I looked in every hardware store for miles and could not find a white 15 ft cord with heavy gauge wire. So looked on dependable Amazon and saw exactly what I was looking for. Received it in a couple days and have been very pleased with my purchase. Thanks so much for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Magnolia2816

customer_reviews.title: cheap power strip
customer_reviews.text: female plug inputs are very tight and do not want to accept plugs. must be forced.
customer_reviews.author: arnold

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these power strips, each with a 25 foot cord. They arrived promptly and were exactly what I needed. Quality seems good. Durability will take some time as I have only had them for about a week. I'm very satisfied with them so far and will buy again when needed,
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the room that has a shortage on outlets ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for the room that has a shortage on outlets and a surplus of electric gadgets. Long, long cord! And since it's a surge protector (and not just a power bar), this will protect your gadgets from getting a zap.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Spicer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: This item may work for cheaper US plug-end items, but the "power rails" on the inside of the unit are built too tight, making it impossible to plug higher-end (quality) US plug items into it. Effectively damaging the unit and socket in the process. Avoid this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Silent DoGood

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to get this one because the price was not too high compared with others. Also, I was worried if it can handle large watts as listed in the description. But I decided to gamble anyway and I made a good choice. I can connect to 5 devices at the same time. And the quality is really good with a good length.
customer_reviews.author: Prakriti

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a. Client so I could get his cords out of the way so he would not trip over them. It was the perfect length to run behind the sofa. The plug end fit perfectly under the table next to his recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Irishgirl21

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, sturdy and  convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this power strip because we needed a long extension cord and surge protection. This attractive unit met both requirements. Substantial in appearance without drawing attention to itself.
customer_reviews.author: Floating Apex

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome. My store was built in 1890
customer_reviews.text: A 25 ft long 6 outlet surge protector is almost impossible to find. It’s awesome. My store was built in 1890. Although new outlets & updated electric have been installed- there are still areas that they were unable to add outlets to. These fit the bill!
customer_reviews.author: dr victoria

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Needed a 25 foot cord with multi connections for elderly parent who kept turning off the hospital bed and clock with a wall switch. Worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Casteel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy surge protector power strip is just right for use with my sewing machine and lamp. Why didn't I get this sooner?
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Blair

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed. I was told by the fire Marshall that I could only use one surge protector. All of the plugs in my classroom are on one wall that is not conducive to place my elmo, printer, and computer. This surge protector is heavy duty enough to placate the fire Marshall and long enough to let me put my stuff where I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cogley

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the price - 25 feet cord.
customer_reviews.text: Was having a hard time finding a 20+ foot cord in a light color with 6 outlets. A little too long at 25 feet, but that is ok. Better than plugging an extension into an extension. Seems to be just what I needed. Using for beside a electric loveseat, lamp and electronics.
customer_reviews.author: DPberry

customer_reviews.title: Love having a surge protector power strip this length
customer_reviews.text: Love having a surge protector power strip this length! Most of the ones you normally find are way too short. My tv is on my mantle and before getting this, I had to have this really ghetto looking set up for it! This cord is long enough for me to hide the part with the plugs behind my tv - it looks and works great!
customer_reviews.author: T. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine, does what it is intended to do.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for about three weeks now and it is holding up very well. I needed a really long power strip so I could run from one side of the room to the other going through the closet so it wouldn't be in the way and this does the job!! Decent product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: CLAUDIA GISELLE RIVERA

customer_reviews.title: Good value, mine is defective
customer_reviews.text: Great length. Unfortunately, the one I got seems to be kind of defective...it randomly shuts off so I have to wiggle the plug a bit to get it to work. The outlet itself is fine, I’m wondering if the wires are loose in the cord??
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Long Chord Surge/Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy extension surge chord, bought it for the length of chord, excellent product! Good price for value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Length
customer_reviews.text: Like that it has a lot of extension on the cord as far as footage and like the fact you can plug up a lot of items on it.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great for Home Office
customer_reviews.text: I have attached this to my power strip holder under my desk with easy access for my home office equipment's.
customer_reviews.author: Islandgirl927

customer_reviews.title: Thickness of cord is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Quality of cord is great, thickness is awesome. Have my small freezer and small refrigerator plugged into it!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Auerswald

customer_reviews.title: Great for any home office
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and definitely does the job. I needed it to set up my new computer work station which has no available outlets. Would certainly recommend to any who needs an extension cord with a built in surge protector.
customer_reviews.author: ein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised, appears to be very good quality. Was packaged well and shipped promptly. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Walsh

customer_reviews.title: A nice long cord for the office needs!
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, it blends well with our dark office carpet and it is long, so it stretches nicely from the outlet to the file cabinet. It's an older building, so there aren't many outlets in the rooms, so we have to be creative in terms of using long extension cords! This one works well for our needs!
customer_reviews.author: AcraftyB

customer_reviews.title: Seems acceptable
customer_reviews.text: Even though I know it's made in CHINA - I'm not living in fear that my house will burn down from using these.
customer_reviews.author: CoinClocks

customer_reviews.title: Good six outlet power surge
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this power surge is 8 feet long as some of the objects I wanted to plug in had short cords. I also like the white color. Everything I plugged in fit. I definately recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Graceful

customer_reviews.title: The 15 foot length is marvelous.
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher, I have multiple electronic devices with short cords which did not work for me. This 15 cord allows me to move my electronics where I want.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Item was defective and returned
customer_reviews.text: Item was defective and popped every breaker I plugged it into immediately. Although the company did quickly contacted me and offered a no cost replacement. But I had already purchased a different one at local hardware store and no issues since. I’m sure it was just a random defect and should not be held against them.
customer_reviews.author: amy welch

customer_reviews.title: It is a plug strip.
customer_reviews.text: It is a plug strip, no more, no less. The seller harasses you to give a review. I hope they like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bilbo

customer_reviews.title: I'm Charged Up!
customer_reviews.text: Good solid, well made product. My classic car's battery is now well charged 24/7 in the garage. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Jim from San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, but the price is not. I can get 2 for this same price at Sam's Club.
customer_reviews.author: Wiggly8

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Item. Will Purchase Again
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all of your plug-in electronics in one location; Will be purchasing a few more.
customer_reviews.author: VROCHELLEJ-SHORT-STORY

customer_reviews.title: Mounting was a challenge.
customer_reviews.text: It is a well made product with a heavy cord. A stencil or pattern to locate mounting screws would be most helpful. Providing flat head screws would have been nice too. I drilled out the holes to mount the thing. A real pain.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Red light not working!
customer_reviews.text: Switch is broken, it doesn't light up which makes it so hard to see when is on and when is off. Disappointing ! An update, the manifactor send me a new one and this time is actually working. Thank you, great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: i needed a power outlet strip that was using a red light to indicate when power was on and an extra long cord to reach electrical outlets at some of the bar gigs i was performing at. many times with my old power strip, i could not tell when the power was on or reach an outlet at most places...so this was the answer to my problem!...love it!
customer_reviews.author: mickbass

customer_reviews.title: NOT A SURGE PROTECTOR!! False advertising...
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT A SURGE PROTECTOR!! It's just a power strip...
customer_reviews.author: Hightechprimate

customer_reviews.title: Efficient Power Strip
customer_reviews.text: This power strip fit my needs perfectly with the 8-ft cord. I like the lit up switch and the 6 outlets. The cord and the strip seem to be sturdy and the plus is that the price was affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Debra R. Riess

customer_reviews.title: Love the length of the cord.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cord to go with a black cart I got for my husband for Father’s Day. He seems to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: samdom

customer_reviews.title: surge suppressor with 15' cord

product_meta.title: Digital Energy 6-Outlet Surge Protector Power Strip with 25-Ft Long Extension Cord, White, ETL Listed, UL Standard
feature_bullets: 25 Foot, 6 Outlet surge protector power strip with lighted On/Off switch. Rated for 15 AMP / 120V / 60 Hz / 1875 Watts / 1ns response time. 14/3 Gauge Wire. Two keyhole style mounting holes in the back. ETL Listed, UL Standard 1363.
350 Joules of Surge Protection: Keep your electronics safe from power surges and circuit overload.

Meets Safety Standards: ETL Listed, Conforms to UL Standard No. 1363 and ANSI / UL Standard 1449. The ETL mark is proof of this products compliance to North American safety standards. Authorities Having Jurisdiction (AHJs) and code officials across the US and Canada accept the ETL Listed Mark as proof of a product's compliance to published industry standards.

🛑 As per fire safety guidelines, please don't use a space heater with this power strip/surge protector. Please plug your space heater directly into your power socket. Using a power strip/surge protector with a space heater can cause a fire due to the high current flow that emits from a space heater. Also not recommended for use outdoors or in wet areas. Thank you.

Lifetime Guarantee: Digital Energy has been manufacturing quality electronic accessories since 1999! Customer satisfaction is our main priority so please don't hesitate to contact us with any questions or concerns. All DE surge products come with a Lifetime Warranty and hassle free returns!
